price: Mose hͻ nso, εberε a Yεde nyinasoͻ pefee somaa no kͻͻ Farao hͻ,
arabic: وَفِي مُوسَىٰٓ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wafī mūsā idh arsalnāhu ilā fir'ʿawna bisul'ṭānin mubīnin
